channel.title: CVE Feed for Logitech -- Logitech Options Plus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Logitech -- Logitech Options Plus

item.title: CVE-2024-8258|2024-09-10T13:56:50.325Z -- logitech -- logitech%20options%20plus
item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') in Electron Fuses in Logitech Options Plus version 1.60.496306 on macOS allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via insecure Electron Fuses configuration.
